me.lucko.helper.menu

Class Slot

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.lucko.helper.menu.Slot

  • public class Slot
extends Object
    Represents a slot in a Gui. All changes made to this object are applied to the backing Gui instance, and vice versa.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Map<ClickType,Set<Consumer<InventoryClickEvent>>> handlers
